text: The Visherka () is a river in Perm Krai, Russia, a right tributary of the Kolva.Visherka in encyclopedia of Perm Krai It is long, and its drainage basin covers .«Река Вишерка», Russian State Water Registry It flows out of Lake Chusovskoye in the north of the Cherdynsky District near its border with the Komi Republic. Its mouth is upstream of the uninhabited village of Bogatyryovo, from the mouth of the Kolva. Its most significant tributaries are: * Left: Larevka, Volim; * Right: Shchugor ==References== Category:Rivers of Perm Krai
title: Visherka
